wikipedia_page.main: Henry Colville Montgomery Campbell  (11 October 1887 – 26 December 1970) was a Church of England bishop.  He was ordained in 1910 and served as vicar or rector in a number of London parishes before being consecrated as a bishop in 1940, holding, successively, the suffragan bishoprics of Willesden and Kensington and the diocesan bishoprics of Guildford and London until his retirement in 1961.
